data.eml:eml: Long-distance introduction: first New World record of Stevenia deceptoria (Loew) and a key to the genera of New World Rhinophoridae (Diptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mulieri, Pablo Ricardo, Patitucci, Luciano Damián, Mariluis, Juan Carlos, Pape, Thomas (2010): Long-distance introduction: first New World record of Stevenia deceptoria (Loew) and a key to the genera of New World Rhinophoridae (Diptera). Zootaxa 2524: 66-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.293704
